posts.postText: Hey wait, doesn't that happen when you throw an incendary grenade next to discombobulator, so that the fire goes flying into someone's head?

>> Kryzoid":f9gsoe0w]
Hey wait, doesn't that happen when you throw an incendary grenade next to discombobulator, so that the fire goes flying into someone's head?

weapon

>>

Hmm a mystery. I shall start recording matches
